name: R5_v3_RoleCode_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.RoleCode for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-RoleCode|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: non-country member minor without residence permit
non-country member minor with residence permit

Ambulatory Health Care Facilities; Clinic/Center; Rehabilitation: Cardiac Facilities
